title: Captain Morty Commands the Sky
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,272 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 690L, Fiction Series
description: Going on an airplane for the first time can be an exciting and nerve-racking adventure, especially when you are in charge! Follow Morty as he guides his blind grandmother through a day of travel in Captain Morty Commands the Sky. Will they make it to their destination, or will the responsibilities be too much for Morty to handle? Rich character dialog and a relatable story will engage readers. This book can be used to teach students how to identify character point of view and to recognize articles.
meta: abuzz, checking, descending, indicator, passengers, schedule, security checkpoint, transport, turbulence
Story Elements : Identify character point of view
Articles : Recognize and use articles a and an
